downloadTitle: Managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2010
downloadDescription: This whitepaper describes how to configure your Lync Server 2010 environment to successfully host and participate in large and structured meetings.

downloadFile.name: Managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2010.docx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/a/0/ba08ea7c-35f3-469e-b4a7-181b1c3af3f8/Managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2010.docx

detailsSection: This whitepaper describes how to configure your Lync Server 2010 environment to successfully host and participate in large and structured meetings.
detailsSection_file_name: Managing Large and Structured Meetings with Lync 2010.docx
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: network Planning, Monitoring, and Troubleshooting with Lync Server
